snippet: Lloyd Morgan Jr., 4, was killed on a playground in the South Bronx on July 22, and mourners at his funeral decried a recent rash of gun violence that has left two children dead.
abstract: Mourners at the funeral of 4-year-old Lloyd Morgan, who was shot and killed on a playground in the South Bronx, decry the recent rash of gun violence in New York City that has left two children dead and several wounded.
lead_paragraph: Lloyd Morgan Jr., 4, was killed on a playground in the South Bronx on July 22, and mourners at his funeral decried a recent rash of gun violence that has left two children dead.

headline.seo: Funeral for Lloyd Morgan Jr. Marked by Outrage and Despair
headline.main: At Funeral of Boy Who Was Shot, Outrage and Despair
headline.print_headline: At Funeral of Boy Who Was Shot, Outrage and Despair
